dcterms:creator: M. Marelli
S. Menini
M. Baroni
L. Bentivogli
R. Bernardi
R. Zamparelli
dcterms:description: This dataset is taken from the Sentences Involving Compositional Knowledge (SICK) dataset for semantic evaluation of English sentences. It has 5000 pairs of sentences for training, and 5,000 sentences for testing. Each pair of sentences has a similarity label ∈ {1,2,3,4,5}, which 1 means that the sentences are irrelevant and 5 meaning the most similar sentences. We consider the label = 0 as class 0 and the label ∈ {2,3,4,5} as class 1.
dcterms:title: SemEval2014

dcterms:creator: S.V. Moravvej
M. Joodaki
M.J.M. Kahaki
M.S. Sartakhti
dcterms:description: Semantic Text Similarity (STS) is based on image captions, news headlines, and user forums. This database has 6928 sentences for training, and 1500 sentences for testing. To make unrelated pairs, we put unrelated sentences together.
dcterms:title: STS (Semantic Text Similarity)

dcterms:creator: W. Bao
W. Bao
J. Du
Y. Yang
X. Zhao
dcterms:description: Microsoft Research Paraphrase corpus (MSRP) is a paraphrasing corpus containing 4076 pairs of sentences for training and 1725 pairs of sentences for testing. The sentences in this dataset are tagged by humans.
dcterms:title: MSRP (Microsoft Research Paraphrase corpus)
